page.title: 03Employment in the area.
page.content: There is a wide variety of jobs available in the area.The level of unemployment is below the national average,which means that there is usually a choice of occupations available to those that are looking. Many women who live and work locally are employed part-time in shops or as cleaners,home helps,cashiers,lollypop ladies or school dinner ladies. As well as work being available in businesses and offices, there are a number of small Industrial Estates in Morden,Hackbridge, Wrythe Green,and Mitcham to mention just a few.The goods produced range from scaffolding to beds,and from scalpels to film. Many people live in the area and commute to London,Croydon,Sutton and Wallington.There are good,quick communications for easy travel.
